info.description: This is the API documentation for Chatwoot server.
info.title: Chatwoot

userApiKey.name: api_access_token
userApiKey.description: This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to  endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

agentBotApiKey.name: api_access_token
agentBotApiKey.description: This token should be provided by system admin or obtained via rails console. This token can be used to build bot integrations and can only access limited apis.

platformAppApiKey.name: api_access_token
platformAppApiKey.description: This token can be obtained by the system admin after creating a platformApp. This token should be used to provision agent bots, accounts, users and their roles.

post.description:
Creating a conversation in chatwoot requires a source id. 

 Learn more about source_id: https://github.com/chatwoot/chatwoot/wiki/Building-on-Top-of-Chatwoot:-Importing-Existing-Contacts-and-Creating-Conversations

inbox_id.description:
Id of inbox in which the conversation is created
Allowed Inbox Types: Website, Phone, Api, Email

contact_id.description: Contact Id for which conversation is created

additional_attributes.description: Lets you specify attributes like browser information

custom_attributes.description: The object to save custom attributes for conversation, accepts custom attributes key and value

status.description: Specify the conversation whether it's pending, open, closed

assignee_id.description: Agent Id for assigning a conversation to an agent

team_id.description: Team Id for assigning a conversation to a team

post.description: Filter conversations with custom filter options and pagination

values.description: array of the attribute values to filter

get.description: Get all details regarding a conversation with all messages in the conversation

post.description: Toggles the status of the conversation between open and resolved
Toggles the priority of conversation
Assign a conversation to an agent or a team

team_id.description: Id of the team. If the assignee_id is present, this param would be ignored

get.description: Lists all the labels of a conversation

post.description: Add labels to a conversation. Note that this API would overwrite the existing list of labels associated to the conversation.

get.description: List all inboxes available in the current account
Get an inbox available in the current account

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the inbox

post.description: You can create more than one website inbox in each account

welcome_title.description: Welcome title to be displayed on the widget

welcome_tagline.description: Welcome tagline to be displayed on the widget

agent_away_message.description: A message which will be sent if there is not agent available. This is not available if agentbot is connected

widget_color.description: A Hex-color string used to customize the widget

get.description: Get conversation metrics for Agent

schema.description: Array of agent based conversation metrics

short_code.description: Short Code for quick access of the canned response

attribute_display_type.description: Attribute display type (text, number, currency, percent, link, date, list, checkbox)

event_name.description: Automation Rule event, on which we call the actions(conversation_created, conversation_updated, message_created)

name.example: Add label on message create event

description.description: Description to give more context about the rule
description.example: Add label support and sales on message create event if incoming message content contains text help

actions.description: Array of actions which we perform when condition matches

conditions.description: Array of conditions on which conversation/message filter would work

config.description: Save information about locales, allowed_locales and default portal/help-center locale

associated_category_id.description: To associate similar categories to each other, e.g same category of product documentation in different languages

parent_category_id.description: To define parent category, e.g product documentation has multiple level features in sales category or in engineering category.

associated_article_id.description: To associate similar articles to each other, e.g to provide the link for the reference.

additional_attributes.description: The object containing additional attributes related to the contact

custom_attributes.description: The object to save custom attributes for contact, accepts custom attributes key and value

timestamp.description: The time at which conversation was created

additional_attributes.description: The object containing additional attributes related to the conversation

custom_attributes.description: The object to save custom attributes for conversation, accepts custom attributes key and value

content.description: The text content of the message

content_type.description: The type of the template message

content_attributes.description: The content attributes for each content_type

created_at.description: The time at which message was created

private.description: The flags which shows whether the message is private or not

attachment.description: The file object attached to the image

custom_attributes.description: Available for users who are created through platform APIs and has custom attributes associated.

availability_status.description: The availability status of the agent computed by Chatwoot.

auto_offline.description: Whether the availability status of agent is configured to go offline automatically when away.

custom_attributes.description: Available for users who are created through platform APIs and has custom attributes associated.

avatar_url.description: The avatar image of the inbox

widget_color.description: Widget Color used for customization of the widget

enable_auto_assignment.description: The flag which shows whether Auto Assignment is enabled or not

web_widget_script.description: Script used to load the website widget

welcome_title.description: Welcome title to be displayed on the widget

welcome_tagline.description: Welcome tagline to be displayed on the widget

greeting_enabled.description: The flag which shows whether greeting is enabled

greeting_message.description: A greeting message when the user starts the conversation

name.description: The name of the agent bot

description.description: The description about the agent bot

account_id.description: Account ID if it's an account specific bot

outgoing_url.description: The webhook URL for the bot

id.description: The ID of the custom filter

name.description: The name of the custom filter

type.description: The description about the custom filter

query.description: A query that needs to be saved as a custom filter

created_at.description: The time at which the custom filter was created

updated_at.description: The time at which the custom filter was updated

url.description: The url to which the events will be send

account_id.description: The id of the account which the webhook object belongs to

role.description: The user role in the account

allow_auto_assign.description: If this setting is turned on, the system would automatically assign the conversation to an agent in the team while assigning the conversation to a team

account_id.description: The ID of the account with the team is a part of

is_member.description: This field shows whether the current user is a part of the team

hook_type.description: Whether the integration is an account or inbox integration

enabled.description: Whether the integration is enabled for the account

allow_multiple_hooks.description: Whether multiple hooks can be created for the integration

hooks.description: If there are any hooks created for this integration

id.description: The ID of the integration hook

app_id.description: The ID of the integration app

inbox_id.description: Inbox ID if its an Inbox integration

status.description: Whether the integration hook is enabled for the account

hook_type.description: Whether its an account or inbox integration hook

settings.description: The associated settings for the integration

source_id.description: The session identifier of the contact

pubsub_token.description: The token to be used to connect to chatwoot websocket

inbox_id.description: The inbox id of the conversation

contact.description: The contact information associated to the conversation

content_attributes.description: Additional content attributes of the message

created_at.description: Created at time stamp of the message

timezone.description: The timezone defined on the inbox

working_hours.description: The working hours defined on the inbox

day_of_week.description: Day of the week as a number. Sunday -> 0, Saturday -> 6

open_all_day.description: Whether or not the business is open the whole day

closed_all_day.description: Whether or not the business is closed the whole day

open_hour.description: Opening hour. Can be null if closed all day

open_minutes.description: Opening minute. Can be null if closed all day

close_hour.description: Closing hour. Can be null if closed all day

close_minutes.description: Closing minute. Can be null if closed all day

working_hours_enabled.description: Whether of not the working hours are enabled on the inbox

csat_survey_enabled.description: Whether of not the Customer Satisfaction survey is enabled on the inbox

greeting_enabled.description: Whether of not the Greeting Message is enabled on the inbox

identity_validation_enabled.description: Whether of not the User Identity Validation is enforced on the inbox

name.description: The name of the agent bot

description.description: The description about the agent bot

outgoing_url.description: The webhook URL for the bot

password.description: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase letters, number and a special character

custom_attributes.description: Custom attributes you want to associate with the user

short_code.description: Short Code for quick access of the canned response

attribute_display_type.description: Attribute display type (text- 0, number- 1, currency- 2, percent- 3, link- 4, date- 5, list- 6, checkbox- 7)

avatar.description: Send the form data with the avatar image binary or use the avatar_url

avatar_url.description: The url to a jpeg, png file for the contact avatar

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the contact in external system

custom_attributes.description: An object where you can store custom attributes for contact. example {"type":"customer", "age":30}

avatar.description: Send the form data with the avatar image binary or use the avatar_url

avatar_url.description: The url to a jpeg, png file for the contact avatar

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the contact in external system

custom_attributes.description: An object where you can store custom attributes for contact. example {"type":"customer", "age":30}

private.description: Flag to identify if it is a private note

content_type.description: if you want to create custom message types

content_attributes.description: attributes based on your content type

allow_auto_assign.description: If this setting is turned on, the system would automatically assign the conversation to an agent in the team while assigning the conversation to a team

name.description: The name of the custom filter

type.description: The description about the custom filter

query.description: A query that needs to be saved as a custom filter

url.description: The url where the events should be sent

subscriptions.description: The events you want to subscribe to.

app_id.description: The ID of app for which integration hook is being created

inbox_id.description: The inbox ID, if the hook is an inbox hook

settings.description: The settings required by the integration
The settings required by the integration

name.example: Add label on message create event

description.description: The description about the automation and actions
description.example: Add label support and sales on message create event if incoming message content contains text help

event_name.description: The event when you want to execute the automation actions

actions.description: Array of actions which you want to perform when condition matches, e.g add label support if message contains content help.

conditions.description: Array of conditions on which conversation filter would work, e.g message content contains text help.

archived.description: Status to check if portal is live

custom_domain.description: Custom domain to  display help center.

slug.description: Slug for the portal to display in link

position.description: Category position in the portal list to sort

associated_category_id.description: To associate similar categories to each other, e.g same category of product documentation in different languages

parent_category_id.description: To define parent category, e.g product documentation has multiple level features in sales category or in engineering category.

associated_article_id.description: To associate similar articles to each other, e.g to provide the link for the reference.

identifier_hash.description: Identifier hash prepared for HMAC authentication

avatar_url.description: The url to a jpeg, png file for the user avatar

echo_id.description: Temporary identifier which will be passed back via websockets

oneOf.description: Replies to the Bot Message Types

csat_survey_response.description: CSAT Survey Response if original message is CSAT Survey

account_id.name: account_id
account_id.description: The numeric ID of the account

agent_bot_id.name: id
agent_bot_id.description: The ID of the agentbot to be updated

team_id.name: team_id
team_id.description: The ID of the team to be updated

hook_id.name: hook_id
hook_id.description: The numeric ID of the integration hook

source_id.name: source_id
source_id.description:
Id of the session for which the conversation is created. Source Ids can be obtained through contactable inboxes API or via generated.

Website: Chatwoot generated string which can be obtained from webhook events.
Phone Channels(Twilio): Phone number in e164 format
Email Channels: Contact Email address
API Channel: Any Random String

contact_sort_param.name: sort
contact_sort_param.description: The attribute by which list should be sorted

conversation_id.name: conversation_id
conversation_id.description: The numeric ID of the conversation

custom_filter_id.name: custom_filter_id
custom_filter_id.description: The numeric ID of the custom filter

webhook_id.name: webhook_id
webhook_id.description: The numeric ID of the webhook

message_id.name: message_id
message_id.description: The numeric ID of the message

platform_user_id.name: id
platform_user_id.description: The numeric ID of the user on the platform

public_inbox_identifier.name: inbox_identifier
public_inbox_identifier.description: The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

public_contact_identifier.name: contact_identifier
public_contact_identifier.description: The source id of contact obtained on contact create
